column3:
Regitt needs a tank commander for an extended trial.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Pilot the Rolling Tankard to the Stay and fire its cannon at the target dummies.
I, ah, I know this is short notice and all, but...have you got time to help us with an extended trial?
The bloke we trained to command the tank is, uh, “indisposed” at the moment, and no one else is willing or able to take the wheel. As it were.
Please, speak with Wamutt, and he'll brief you on the particulars. You're all we've got, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>!
You're our stand-in? Good, then we can get started!
There's naught to it really: just drive up to the Stay, then blast all the targets with the cannon. Commence trial!
You see, “commence trial” means “bloody go!” Try not to miss any of them dummies.
A group of crude wooden dummies awaits obliteration... Speak to Wamutt at Watts's Anvil to pilot a Rolling Tankard, then command its main cannon to fire upon the targets.
The trial went well, then? Targets blown into sufficiently small chunks and all that? Good to hear!
Our original pilot stumbled in after a few too many mugs, and I couldn't let him near a tank in that condition. There'll be no drinking and firing on my watch!
Anyway, I'm happy to say we've kept to our testing schedule, and it's all thanks to you!
